name: Elphelt
title: The Sniper Bride
subtitle: A deadly marksman who combines precision with devastating firepower
lore: A unique warrior who carries both the grace of a bride and the deadly precision of a sniper. Elphelt's cheerful demeanor masks her incredible combat abilities, as she wields her arsenal of firearms with lethal accuracy while dreaming of finding true love.

passive.name: Affection
passive.description: Elphelt takes [5%] reduced damage from all sources.

Q.name: Charming Bullet
Q.description: Elphelt fires a bullet in the targeted direction, which explodes in a wide circle at the end of its range or upon hitting an enemy, charming all hit enemies for [1.5s] and instantly interrupting their movement. It also deals [90/170/350/495/660/725] damage to them.

W.name: Rapid Shots
W.description: Elphelt rapidly shoots [10] autoattacks at the targeted nearby enemy, each dealing [30% AD] damage.

E.name: Rose Grenade
E.description: Elphelt throws a rose to the targeted location. If it hits an enemy, they are slowed by [60%] and deal [35%] less damage to Elphelt for [2s].

R.name: Instant Kill
R.description: Elphelt targets an enemy within a certain distance. After [2s], she shoots a massive bullet into their heart, dealing massive [1000/1700/2250/3200] damage. If the target survives, they are charmed for [1.5s]. If the target moves out of Elphelt's targeting range, the ability goes on full cooldown, and the shot is canceled.

1.name: Swift Shooter
1.description: Elphelt's Attack Speed increases by [0.02] per level.

1.name: Desperate Escape
1.description: Elphelt gains [35%] bonus Movement Speed when below [40%] HP.

5.name: Piercing Shot
5.description: Charming Bullet penetrates through the target, dealing an additional [50%] damage to all enemies in its path. The explosion now only occurs at the end of its range.

5.name: Quick Draw
5.description: The cooldown of Q ability is reduced from [10s] to [7s].

10.name: Extended Range
10.description: The targeting range of Instant Kill is increased by [25%].

10.name: Focused Shot
10.description: While casting Instant Kill, Elphelt gains [30%] damage reduction.

15.name: Bullet Storm
15.description: Rapid Shots now fires an additional [5] shots within the same duration.

15.name: Enhanced Affection
15.description: Elphelt's passive now reduces incoming damage by [7%].

15.name: Last Stand
15.description: If Elphelt loses [70%] of her HP within [2s], her damage output is increased by [40%] for [2s].

20.name: Team Charm
20.description: When Elphelt charms an enemy, all of her teammates deal [15%] more damage to the charmed target during the effect's duration.

20.name: Glass Cannon
20.description: Elphelt loses [32%] of her maximum HP, but gains [25%] bonus damage.

20.name: Kill Counter
20.description: Elphelt deals [5%] bonus damage with R for each Instant Kill she used this game.
